title: so i heard you get free RP for reaching a certain level?
body: I'm nearly lvl 10 and i heard it was...about lvl 5 or so you get free RP, is this true?

replies.body:
That was in the past, they swapped it for Hextech Crafting by giving a free chest and key. Previously it was 400 RP which is a 3150 ip champ on special (50%) or a moderately cheap skin on 50% sale.  
You should already have received your Hextech Chest and Key when you got to level 4. 
Hope this helps. 
~Catspeare {{champion:268}}
